content:
Crox currently contains this:

        // Chrome does not seem to like how many QueryCacheHit events we generate
        // only handle Interval events for now

but its not clear to me "how" it dislikes the events. The commit that introduced this comment doesn't explain much more either. What happens in Chrome?

I don't recall the exact message but if you load too large of a trace file (which was a lot easier to hit with QueryCacheHit events included), you get some kind of parse error in the JS console and nothing else happens.
